summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Human Resources, authorizing applications to and agreement with the Washington State Planning and Community Affairs Agency for financial assistance under Title III of the Home Energy Assistance Act of 1980 and the Community Services Administration for the operating of a low-income energy assistance program, increasing expenditure allowances in the 1981 Budget of the Department; creating certain positions; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Human Resources Operating Fund.
